title: Quest Runner
description: A collaboration with 4 Software Developers and 3 UI/UX designers to create a gamified task assignment and reward system using MERN, 4 relational database models, and user authentication in a 4-day hackathon that won crowd favorite.
convo: Behold üåüQuest Runner!üåü

title: Spotify
description: This full-stack, Spotify-clone was created using Django and Python with a SQL database. It uses user authentication. Users have full CRUD capabilities on two models, which have 1:1, 1:M, and M:M relationships throughout the site.
convo: Here is a Spotify clone
It's full-stack built with Django and Python with a PostgreSQL database.
It has secure user authentication and users have full CRUD capabilities on 2 models.
Meaning they can create, view, update, and delete their music data
It looks like the real thing!
tech: Python ‚Ä¢ Django ‚Ä¢ PostgreSQL ‚Ä¢ HTML5 ‚Ä¢ CSS3 ‚Ä¢ JQuery

title: Aviato
description: Aviato is a full-stack e-commerce site inpired by today's growing small businesses. Created independently in a single week, it was built using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js (MERN) with the addition of bcrypt for user authentication. It uses three models and has full CRUD functionality throughout the site.
convo: Aviato is an e-commerce platformüõç, created singlehandedly.
In a week!
It's complete with 3 relational database models and user authentication via bcrypt, incorporating local storage for the cart feature
üíªTechnologies used: React.js, JavaScript, Express.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3, JWT
It's got a really slick user interface- so minimal, so modern, so clean. Check it out!
And while you're there, can you buy me that jacket?üòä

title: Twitter 2.0
description: Completed in a single week with a Software Engineer a full-stack web application using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js (MERN) and a user-empathetic interface with full-CRUD (create, read, update, and delete) capabilities through RESTful routing. Backend contains two database models (a tweets and comments schema) which serves user JSON data to the front-end.
convo: Reverse engineered Twitterüê•, it's a full-stack, full-CRUD web application that lets you tweet and comment.
Built with the MERN-stack- MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js
Take a look!üëÄ

title: Portfolio Template
description: This project was merely an exercise in UX/UI design and text animation, built in a few hours. Not mobile responsive nor uses React.js, although it has the potential.
convo: Built for design practiceüé®, this portfolio template features a clean design with lots of fun moving parts.
Feel free to fork and clone, and make this your own portfolio!

title: HyperRealism
